description: Hard working and hard bodied Max Adonis struggles to make ends meet, he dreams about what it would be like to live like the people he works for... and lucky for him the opportunity arrives when one of his sexy clients, Jason Vario, takes notice of Max's true potential. Jason welcomes Max into his world and 'shows' him the finer things, the first of which being how to consume Max's fine body and throbbing cock.
title: The Manscaper, Scene #01
